remarks: An inequality for the prime count of a sum.  This is the source of the ultrametric inequality for the p-adic metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.)
statement:
pcadd.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prime ) $.
pcadd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. QQ ) $.
pcadd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. QQ ) $.
pcadd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( P pCnt A ) <_ ( P pCnt B ) ) $.
pcadd $p |- ( ph -> ( P pCnt A ) <_ ( P pCnt ( A + B ) ) ) $.
